import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import hlogin from '../assets/hlogin1.jpg' import dlogin from '../assets/dlogin1.png' const Registration = () => { const [userType, setUserType] = useState('hospital'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ hospitalName: '', hospitalId: '', donorName: '', email: '', password: '', cnfPassword: '', address: '', gender: '', bloodGroup: '', dateOfBirth: '', pinCode: '' }); const handleChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: value, })); }; const handleUserTypeChange = (event) => { setUserType(event.target.value); }; const getFormHeight = () => { return userType === 'hospital' ? '100px' : '1000px'; }; const handleSubmit = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); try { if (userType === 'hospital') { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/register/hospital', formData); } else { await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/register/donor', formData); } // Handle successful registration, e.g., redirect or show a success message } catch (error) { console.error(error); // Handle registration failure, e.g., show an error message } }; return ( <> {userType === 'hospital' ?
